pages.text: We all admit that whenever we have fever, cold or cough we always go to a doctor.  Doctor is the person who has practiced medicine and is been trained to heal the sick.
A hospital is a place where the sick and the injured are healed. Doctors and nurses work at the hospital. Doctors make use of advanced medical technology to heal patients.
A stethoscope is an instrument used by doctors and other medical people. It is used to measure the heartbeat and the breathing speed of an individual.
Every hospital has an ambulance. The ambulance is a vehicle used to attend the sick person in case of medical emergency. It has a symbol of red cross.
